When the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for portable and household appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to make a refund if necessary.
The customer meets the following requirements for a return:
✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or fall
✔ Confirms that they have deleted their personal data
✔ Has confirmed that they have the return label
✔ Understands that accessories and purchase receipt must be included in the return package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.
Remember: once delivered, the seller has 3 business days (5 for portable and household appliances) to repair or replace the item and 2 business days to make a refund if necessary.

Hello Laura: You will find the return label attached to this message. Chronopost will process your return. Please choose a place that is comfortable for you to send your package. Packaging of the item: The box should be strong and resistant. You must place your item securely inside the box so it doesn't move during transit. The return label should be stuck to the top of the box (you can also add an additional label on the inside to help identify your shipment in case the original label peels off or gets damaged). Take photos of the interior and exterior of your package before sending it. This will protect you in case your item gets damaged during transportation. Your return is ready for shipping! We'll let you know when it arrives. Best regards, Back Market Customer Service
